en: The customer is responsible for bank transfer processing fees. We thank you for your understanding.
zh: 银行转账手续费由客户承担。感谢您的理解。

en: Do you smell something strange?
zh: 你闻到什么奇怪的味道了吗？

en: The first half of the story is set in Boston.
zh: 故事的前半部分发生在波士顿。

en: I used to prefer black tea to coffee, but recently I've been drinking a good amount of both.
zh: 我以前比起咖啡更喜欢红茶，但最近这两样我都喝得挺多的。

en: When should I pick you up tomorrow?
zh: 我明天什么时候去接你？

en: When should I come to pick you up tomorrow?
zh: 我明天什么时候过来接你？

en: Everything is ruined because of you.
zh: 一切都让你给毁了。

en: Tom is a ball of vanity.
zh: 汤姆这人虚荣心极强。

en: An unexpected error has occurred.
zh: 发生了意外错误。

en: I couldn't ask for a better holiday!
zh: 这个假期简直完美！

en: Tom didn't live a long life.
zh: 汤姆不长寿。

en: Learning calculus requires a lot of practice.
zh: 学习微积分需要大量的练习。

en: Last night I saw a very interesting movie about World War II.
zh: 昨晚我看了部关于二战的很有意思的电影。

en: I must admit that it was my fault.
zh: 我必须承认那是我的错。

en: How long have you stayed in Caracas?
zh: 你在加拉加斯待了多久？

en: Violent clashes broke out between the protesters and the police.
zh: 抗议者和警察之间爆发了暴力冲突。

en: The proletarians have nothing to lose but their chains.
zh: 无产者失去的只是锁链。

en: I didn't even know about that ship until I got back.
zh: 我直到回来才知道那艘船的事。

en: What's up? What happened?
zh: 怎么了？发生什么了？

en: What's wrong? What happened?
zh: 怎么回事？出什么事了？

en: What's wrong? Are you sad about something?
zh: 怎么了？你是遇到什么伤心事了吗？

en: That's nothing to be proud of.
zh: 那没什么好得意的。

en: I'm sorry I'm late. I overslept.
zh: 对不起我迟到了，我睡过头了。

en: After opening, please eat as soon as possible.
zh: 开了以后请尽快吃完。

en: At the age of 18, Tom volunteered to join the army.
zh: 汤姆18岁那年自愿参军了。

en: "Tom! Oh how I've missed you." "Me too. At last we meet again."
zh: “汤姆！哦，我多想你啊。”“我也是。我们终于又见面了。”

en: Tom had his black knitted hat pulled far down.
zh: 汤姆把黑色的针织帽压得很低。

en: The moon is in the sky.
zh: 月亮在天上。

en: The moon is in the heavens.
zh: 月亮挂在天空中。

en: Tom speaks beautiful French, without any accent.
zh: 汤姆的法语说得特别好，一点口音都没有。

en: There isn't anyone who knows everything from the outset.
zh: 没有人是一开始就什么都懂的。

en: The boys' room is on the right, and the girls' room is on the left.
zh: 男生的房间在右边，女生的房间在左边。

en: The men's room is on the right, and the women's is on the left.
zh: 男厕所在右边，女厕所在左边。

en: This river forms the boundary between the two prefectures.
zh: 这条河是两县之间的分界线。

en: Tom admires Beckham and started playing soccer because of him.
zh: 汤姆很崇拜贝克汉姆，是因为他才开始踢足球的。

en: Tom and Mary fight constantly.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽老是吵架。

en: They might be able to help me.
zh: 他们也许能帮到我。

en: I may be able to help you.
zh: 我或许能帮你。

en: Perhaps I can help you.
zh: 也许我能帮到你。

en: Those people might be able to help us.
zh: 那些人可能能帮到我们。

en: I am a Japanese woman.
zh: 我是个日本女性。

en: Call me if you need anything.
zh: 有事儿给我打电话。

en: I am a native Japanese-speaking woman. But even though this is the case, I sometimes still make small mistakes when I am writing or speaking.
zh: 我的母语是日语。但即便如此，我写东西或说话时偶尔还是会出点小错。

en: Tom scored a goal.
zh: 汤姆进球了。

en: Thanks for the good advice.
zh: 谢谢你的好建议。

en: This movie is terrible.
zh: 这部电影太烂了。

en: I think this is too expensive.
zh: 我觉得这个太贵了。

en: I'll tell you (this) as a doctor.
zh: 作为医生，我得告诉你这些。

en: I'm just keeping company with Mr.Kimura as a friend.
zh: 我只是作为朋友陪着木村先生。

en: I'm using this room as a storeroom.
zh: 我把这个房间当作储藏室。

en: Mr.Tanaka was hired as a salesman.
zh: 田中先生被聘为推销员。

en: I found the money.
zh: 我找到钱了。

en: I'm usually in pretty good shape, but now I'm a little overweight.
zh: 我平时身材挺好的，但现在有点超重。

en: This hat is from Australia.
zh: 这顶帽子是澳大利亚买的。

en: These boots are from Australia.
zh: 这双靴子是澳大利亚买的。

en: Thanks for loving a fool like me.
zh: 谢谢你爱着像我这样的傻瓜。

en: I’m not saying you have to become totally ripped, but you should at least do some muscle training or you’ll probably end up bedridden before you know it.
zh: 我不是说非得练出一身肌肉，但你起码得做点肌肉训练，不然说不定哪天你就卧床不起了。

en: I don't speak Arabic very well.
zh: 我阿拉伯语说得不太好。

en: My dog follows me whenever I leave the room.
zh: 只要我一离开房间，我的狗就会跟着我。

en: I need to set my watch to two minutes faster.
zh: 我得把我的表调快两分钟。

en: I don't speak French fluently.
zh: 我法语说得不流利。

en: I burned the newspaper.
zh: 我把报纸烧了。

en: I drank coffee.
zh: 我喝了咖啡。

en: I don't have any brothers or sisters.
zh: 我没有兄弟姐妹。

en: Won't you please stay a little bit longer?
zh: 你能再多留一会儿吗？

en: Won't you stay a little bit longer?
zh: 再多待一会儿好吗？

en: Please stay a little longer.
zh: 请再多留一会儿。

en: I used to eat pizza, but now I don't eat it at all.
zh: 我以前常吃披萨，但现在一点都不吃了。

en: I used to eat pizza, but now I don't.
zh: 我以前常吃披萨，但现在不吃了。

en: Just seeing a picture of food is enough and I start to feel sick.
zh: 只要看到食物的照片，我就觉得不舒服。

en: Just looking at a picture of food makes me feel nauseous.
zh: 光是看食物的照片我就觉得恶心。

en: Tom always sleeps hugging his teddy bear.
zh: 汤姆总是抱着他的泰迪熊睡觉。

en: I also want to hear Tom's opinion.
zh: 我也想听听汤姆的想法。

en: Tom, I also want to hear your opinion.
zh: 汤姆，我也想听听你的想法。

en: Mary was unaware of her own beauty.
zh: 玛丽根本没意识到自己有多漂亮。

en: I think Tom doesn't realize how charming he is.
zh: 我觉得汤姆没意识到自己多有魅力。

en: I get chapped lips every winter.
zh: 我每年冬天嘴唇都会起皮。

en: Don't panic over something like that.
zh: 别因为那种事儿大惊小怪的。

en: It seems that Tom only eats fruits and vegetables.
zh: 汤姆好像只吃蔬菜水果。

en: What do I gotta do to find a job that will suit me?
zh: 我得怎么做才能找到适合自己的工作？

en: What should I do to find a suitable job for myself?
zh: 我该怎么做才能找到一份合适的工作？

en: Do you know why Tom is absent from school?
zh: 你知道汤姆为什么没来上学吗？

en: Last month I officially divorced my wife.
zh: 上个月我正式和我老婆离婚了。

en: There is no limit to human desire.
zh: 人的欲望是没有止境的。

en: This is about all I can put up with.
zh: 这差不多就是我忍耐的极限了。

en: Are you, by any chance, afraid of me?
zh: 你该不会是怕我吧？

en: Are you, by any chance, scared of me?
zh: 你该不会是被我吓到了吧？

en: I know you like to travel, Tom.
zh: 汤姆，我知道你挺喜欢旅行的。

en: I'll be there in about 10 minutes so please wait.
zh: 我大概10分钟后到，等我一下。

en: Because of the snow, I couldn't see anything.
zh: 雪太大了，我什么也看不见。

en: I went out for a walk.
zh: 我出去散了会儿步。

en: I need coloured pencils.
zh: 我需要彩色铅笔。

en: I often used to eat pizza.
zh: 我以前经常吃披萨。

en: I was happy that for the first time in a while, I got to talk with someone I had missed.
zh: 能和好久不见的想念的人聊上天，我真的很开心。

en: Tom wrapped his arms around Mary.
zh: 汤姆搂住了玛丽。

en: I'd like some motion sickness medicine for children.
zh: 我想要点小孩吃的晕车药。

en: Tom wiped his forehead with a handkerchief.
zh: 汤姆用手帕擦了擦额头。

en: "What's the purpose of your staying?" "It is to participate in the voluntarism held by Giban village (That takes place here)"
zh: “你留在这儿是干嘛呢？”“是为了参加基班村举行的志愿活动。”

en: Effort for effort’s sake is meaningless. That effort must produce results.
zh: 为了努力而努力是没有意义的，努力必须得有成果。

en: Working hard for the sake of it is meaningless. That work must produce results.
zh: 为了干活而干活没啥意义，干活儿得干出成果才行。

en: "Tom, what's your dream for the future?" "I want to become a stay-at-home dad."
zh: “汤姆，你未来的梦想是什么？”“我想当个全职爸爸。”

en: I was talking to Tom yesterday, and when I told him I was interested in programming he recommended Python to me. Mary, do you know anything about it?
zh: 昨天我和汤姆聊天，我说我对编程感兴趣，他就给我推荐了Python。玛丽，你对这了解吗？

en: Bye! Let's do this again!
zh: 拜拜！下次再聚！

en: "Tom, you were waking up at time of the earthquake?" "Yeah, was there an earthquake?" "Yes, it was a little after 1:30. It was a fairly large tremor" "Really? I slept through it just like normal."
zh: “汤姆，地震那会儿你醒着吗？”“是吗，地震了吗？”“对，一点半多一点，震感挺强的。”“真的？我睡得跟平时一样死。”

en: Feel free to speak German.
zh: 随便说德语，没事儿。

en: Tom doesn't know the first thing about programming.
zh: 汤姆对编程一窍不通。

en: Here, this is a Japanese Souvenir. I hope you like it.
zh: 给，这是日本带回来的特产，希望你喜欢。

en: Tom always uses the rice cooker that he brought back from Japan.
zh: 汤姆一直用着他从日本带回来的那个电饭煲。

en: This is a folding fan, and this is how you open it. It's for hot summer days.
zh: 这是一个折扇，得这么打开，是夏天热的时候用的。

en: I have to let off some steam before I explode with anger.
zh: 在我气炸之前，我得先发泄一下。

en: I think things will work out.
zh: 我觉得事情总会解决的。

en: I think things will be OK.
zh: 我觉得会没事的。

en: I have 3 projects that I need to finish up by the weekend!
zh: 周末前我得搞定三个项目！

en: Tom has a funny way of laughing, doesn't he?
zh: 汤姆笑起来的样子挺逗的，是吧？

en: Do you want to play shogi?
zh: 你想下将棋吗？

en: This store uses a water filter.
zh: 这家店用了净水器。

en: This store's water is filtered.
zh: 这家店的水是过滤过的。

en: Excuse me, I'm coming through.
zh: 不好意思，借过一下。

en: I have a friend who lives in Tokyo.
zh: 我有个朋友住在东京。

en: I'm doing my best to get better at speaking, since I think the better I get, the more friends I can make.
zh: 我在努力练习口语，因为我觉得口语越好，能交的朋友就越多。

en: You are the only one who can save the world.
zh: 只有你能拯救世界。

en: Do you really think that kind of thing can be done?
zh: 你真觉得那种事儿办得成吗？

en: Are you in a lot of pain?
zh: 你很疼吗？

en: Tom started to get angry.
zh: 汤姆开始生气了。

en: Get a grip on yourself.
zh: 你冷静点。

en: This is not the entrance.
zh: 这不是入口。

en: This isn't the entrance.
zh: 这里不是入口。

en: "Ahhhh!" "What's with you all a sudden?" "Something fell."
zh: “啊！”“你怎么突然一惊一乍的？”“有东西掉了。”

en: Something has fallen by your feet.
zh: 你脚边掉了个东西。

en: I think it's unfair that you can't receive a good education if you're poor.
zh: 我觉得穷人受不到良好的教育很不公平。

en: Um, you dropped your hat.
zh: 那个，你帽子掉了。

en: Let's conserve our limited water supply.
zh: 咱们节约一下有限的供水吧。

en: Let's conserve our limited water resources.
zh: 咱们节约一下有限的水资源吧。

en: "Nah, I wouldn't say anything to a guy like Tom." "That's right. Why would you say anything to a blabbermouth like him, of all people?"
zh: “没，我才不会跟汤姆那种人说什么呢。”“就是。干嘛非要跟那种大嘴巴说话啊？”

en: Please take all of your medicine as prescribed.
zh: 请按医嘱把药吃完。

en: I need to find somebody who can babysit on Friday nights.
zh: 我得找个周五晚上能帮我带孩子的人。

en: If you would like to speak to a customer service representative, please press three.
zh: 如需人工服务，请按3。

en: I'd like to visit Boston at least one more time before I die.
zh: 我想在临死前再去一趟波士顿。

en: I want to go to Boston at least one more time before I die.
zh: 我想在去世前再去一次波士顿。

en: The best way to learn a foreign language is to go live in a country where it's spoken.
zh: 学习外语最好的办法就是去说那种语言的国家生活。

en: Why don't you call customer service?
zh: 你干嘛不给客服打个电话？

en: Can you wait a minute?
zh: 能等一下吗？

en: Thanks to both of you.
zh: 谢谢你们两个。

en: As far as I know, such a function doesn't exist.
zh: 据我所知，没有这个功能。

en: As far as I know, there is no such function.
zh: 据我了解，没有这样的功能。

en: The website you told me about was very interesting and also useful.
zh: 你跟我说的那个网站很有趣，也挺实用的。

en: How many hours a day do you sleep?
zh: 你一天睡几个小时？

en: I wish I could live in Boston.
zh: 我真想住在波士顿。

en: I spend at least three hours a week studying French.
zh: 我每周至少花三个小时学法语。

en: Instead of saying up-front that you can't do it, maybe you could try challenging yourself.
zh: 与其还没做就说不行，不如试着挑战一下自己。

en: Come anytime you like.
zh: 你想什么时候来都行。

en: How could someone like you understand what I'm feeling!
zh: 你这种人怎么能理解我的感受！

en: At that hospital, even if you've got an appointment you have to wait at least two hours, so be ready for that.
zh: 那家医院就算预约了也得等至少两个小时，你得有个心理准备。

en: This is all I can do for now.
zh: 我目前能做的就这些了。

en: I too have moments sometimes where I think I'm useless no matter how hard I try.
zh: 有时候我也会觉得，无论自己怎么努力都一无是处。

en: Tom noticed Mary's look and cracked a smile.
zh: 汤姆注意到玛丽在看他，咧嘴笑了。

en: This story is based on a true story.
zh: 这个故事是根据真人真事改编的。

en: This work is fiction. It has no relationship with any real persons, organizations, etc.
zh: 本作品纯属虚构，与现实中的人物、团体等均无关系。

en: Don't lie to me again.
zh: 别再对我撒谎了。

en: Tom is doing the laundry.
zh: 汤姆在洗衣服。

en: Tom is doing the wash.
zh: 汤姆正在洗衣服。

en: Thanks for helping me.
zh: 谢谢你帮我。

en: Is somebody down there?
zh: 下面有人吗？

en: Can someone call security?
zh: 谁能叫下保安？

en: Did anybody call for security?
zh: 有人叫保安了吗？

en: Does anybody know if the cafeteria is still open?
zh: 有人知道食堂现在还开着吗？

en: Someone needs to talk to Tom about what happened.
zh: 得找个人跟汤姆谈谈发生的事。

en: Why would anybody do something like that?
zh: 怎么会有人做出那种事？

en: Don't let anyone in his room.
zh: 别让任何人进他的房间。

en: Pick on somebody your own size, you bully.
zh: 找个个头跟你差不多的人去比划，你这欺负人的。

en: There doesn't seem to be anyone around.
zh: 周围好像没人。

en: If anyone here can help us, we'd appreciate it.
zh: 如果这里有人能帮帮我们，我们将不胜感激。

en: Nobody wants to talk about that.
zh: 没人想聊那个。

en: Come out with your hands up.
zh: 举起手来，出来！

en: Be sure to eat right and have lots of liquids. I hope you get well soon!
zh: 记得好好吃饭，多喝点水。祝你早日康复！

en: Make sure you drink plenty of fluids and nourish yourself and get better soon.
zh: 记得多喝水，多补充营养，早点好起来。

en: I want to live in Tampa.
zh: 我想住在坦帕。

en: Playing with fire is dangerous.
zh: 玩火很危险。

en: Tom is sitting on the sofa, reading a magazine.
zh: 汤姆正坐在沙发上看杂志。

en: Everyone laughed except for Tom.
zh: 除了汤姆，大家都笑了。

en: "I discovered a a great website today. It's called the 'Tatoeba project', if you're interested." "If you're talking about 'Tatoeba', I've already known about it and have been making submissions for 10 years!"
zh: “我今天发现了一个很棒的网站。叫‘Tatoeba项目’，如果你感兴趣的话。”“如果是说Tatoeba的话，我早就知道了，而且我都已经在上面投稿十年了！”

en: The stars are shining very brightly in the sky tonight.
zh: 今晚天上的星星特别亮。

en: "I wonder why you always lose just one sock out of a pair." "If you lost both, you wouldn't notice it, right?" "Yeah, I guess you're right."
zh: “我在想为什么一双袜子总是只丢一只。”“要是两只都丢了，你也就不会察觉到了，对吧？”“嗯，也是。”

en: "Tom, you're pretending to be asleep, aren't you?" "No, I'm asleep." "A sleeping person shouldn't be able to answer, you know?"
zh: “汤姆，你在装睡吧？”“没，我睡着了。”“睡着的人是不会回答的，知道吗？”

en: It's been cool and raining since morning today.
zh: 今天从早上开始就一直凉飕飕的，还下着雨。

en: Two children are sitting on the wall.
zh: 两个小孩坐在墙头上。

en: I've been to Boston three times.
zh: 我去过波士顿三次。

en: Tom bought a new house.
zh: 汤姆买了一套新房子。

en: Tom didn't need to buy that book.
zh: 汤姆没必要买那本书。

en: You should've come to the party.
zh: 你当时要是来参加聚会就好了。

en: May I ask you what your name is?
zh: 请问你叫什么名字？

en: At least say you are sorry.
zh: 你好歹道个歉吧。

en: If you have something you want to say, hurry up and say it!
zh: 有话就快说！

en: You are really a hopeless idiot, aren't you?
zh: 你真是个无可救药的笨蛋，对吧？

en: "Tom and Mary" was truly an irredeemable piece of trash.
zh: 《汤姆和玛丽》简直是烂得无可救药。

en: "Tom and Mary" was really a hopeless failure.
zh: 《汤姆和玛丽》真是个彻底的失败作。

en: All the way to the end, "Tom and Mary" was a hopeless and depressing story.
zh: 直到最后，《汤姆和玛丽》都是个绝望又压抑的故事。

en: How many chin-ups can you do, Tom?
zh: 汤姆，你能做多少个引体向上？

en: Tom, how many pull-ups can you do?
zh: 汤姆，你能做多少个引体向上？

en: That's an interesting proposal. I'll think about it.
zh: 这个提议挺有意思。我会考虑一下的。

en: Santa, I would like a girlfriend for my Christmas present.
zh: 圣诞老人，我想要个女朋友当圣诞礼物。

en: I have a lot of homework today.
zh: 我今天作业很多。

en: I wonder what the advantage of this technique is.
zh: 我在想这项技术有什么优势。

en: Is this your first time in Korea?
zh: 你是第一次来韩国吗？

en: Tom has a tendency to jump to conclusions.
zh: 汤姆总爱草率地下结论。

en: Tom, you're pretending to be asleep, aren't you?
zh: 汤姆，你在装睡吧？

en: I'm from Hungary.
zh: 我来自匈牙利。

en: It's quite humid.
zh: 挺潮湿的。

en: It's very humid.
zh: 非常潮湿。

en: Don’t take life so seriously.
zh: 别把生活看得太严肃了。

en: My menstrual cramps have been horrible lately.
zh: 我最近痛经痛得厉害。

en: Recently, my menstrual cramps have been severe.
zh: 最近我痛经特别严重。

en: I'm feeling really grumpy. I guess it's PMS.
zh: 我心情特别烦躁，估计是经前综合征。

en: Can I come tomorrow too?
zh: 我明天也能来吗？

en: Is it okay to come tomorrow too?
zh: 明天来可以吗？

en: May I come tomorrow, too?
zh: 明天我也能过来吗？

en: Is it OK if I come tomorrow, too?
zh: 我明天也过来行吗？

en: Can I come tomorrow, too?
zh: 我明天也能来吗？

en: Once in a while, go outside and get some exercise.
zh: 偶尔也去外面运动运动吧。

en: Hurry up and go to bed. It’s already midnight.
zh: 快去睡觉，都半夜了。

en: "If you're not feeling good today you should stay home" "No, no. I'll be fine."
zh: “要是你今天不舒服就在家待着吧。”“没事，没事，我挺好的。”

en: Don't feel so down. Go have something tasty and cheer up.
zh: 别垂头丧气的，去吃点好吃的振作一下。

en: Tom passed a five euro note to his daughter, Mary, and said "buy whatever you'd like with this."
zh: 汤姆递给他女儿玛丽一张五欧元的纸币，说：“拿去随便买点你喜欢的吧。”

en: Does this dress make me look fat?
zh: 这件裙子我穿上显胖吗？

en: "It smells like popcorn." "It really does!"
zh: “闻着像爆米花。”“真的，还真是。”

en: Can you spell "Massachusetts"?
zh: 你会拼“Massachusetts”吗？

en: A young woman was playing a guitar while singing along in front of the fountain.
zh: 喷泉前有个年轻女子在一边弹吉他一边唱歌。

en: A young woman was singing and playing the guitar in front of the fountain.
zh: 喷泉前有个年轻女子在弹吉他唱歌。

en: In front of the water fountain, there was a young woman accompanying herself on a guitar.
zh: 喷泉前有个年轻女子在弹吉他自弹自唱。

en: A white-haired man was playing an accordion outside the shop.
zh: 店门口有个白头发的老头在拉手风琴。

en: "I'm sorry." "You think you can get away with it just by saying sorry!?"
zh: “对不起。”“你以为说句对不起就能完事了？”

en: I get a headache just hearing the name "Tom."
zh: 一听到“汤姆”这个名字我就头大。

en: Eating habits in China have been rapidly becoming Americanized in recent years.
zh: 这些年中国的饮食习惯正迅速变得美国化。

en: The snow has accumulated knee-deep in Boston.
zh: 波士顿的雪已经积到膝盖那么深了。

en: Mary often wears revealing clothes.
zh: 玛丽经常穿得很暴露。

en: It hurts to even walk with my thigh muscles aching.
zh: 大腿肌肉疼得厉害，走起路来都难受。

en: I feel a little better now after crying all I had.
zh: 痛痛快快地哭了一场，现在感觉好多了。

en: "Tom, I have to tell you something. I love someone. His name starts with TO and ends with M." "Er, who would that be? Is it someone I know?"
zh: “汤姆，我有件事要告诉你。我爱上了一个人。他的名字是 TO 开头，M 结尾。”“呃，那是谁啊？我认识吗？”

en: "Tom, I have to tell you something. I love someone. His name starts with T and ends with M." "Er, who would that be? Is it someone I know?"
zh: “汤姆，我有件事要告诉你。我爱上了一个人。他的名字是 T 开头，M 结尾。”“呃，那是谁啊？我认识吗？”

en: I got some shampoo in my eyes. It burns!
zh: 洗发露进眼里了。辣得疼！

en: I got some shampoo in my eyes and it stings.
zh: 洗发露进眼里了，蛰得慌。

en: I got some shampoo in my eyes and it burns.
zh: 洗发露进眼里了，烧得难受。

en: I got shampoo in my eyes and it hurts.
zh: 洗发水进我眼睛里了，好疼。

en: What time do you think you'll likely arrive?
zh: 你觉得你大概几点能到？

en: "Are Tom and Mary dating?" "No, they're just good friends."
zh: “汤姆和玛丽在谈恋爱吗？”“没有，他们只是好朋友。”

en: Please return the book you borrowed when you've finished reading it.
zh: 书看完后记得把借的那本还我。

en: Please return the book I lent you after you've finished reading it.
zh: 我借你的那本书看完后请还给我。

en: Which historical figure would you want to meet if you could?
zh: 如果可以，你想见哪位历史人物？

en: If you were only able to meet with one historical figure, who would you like to meet?
zh: 如果只能见一位历史人物，你想见谁？

en: A girl quietly approached the pair's workplace. The girl did so quietly — though to be accurate, she was a mute.
zh: 一个女孩静静地走近了两人的工位。她走得很轻——准确地说，她是个哑巴。

en: Just when she said "Ooh, what a beautiful star," a star fell across the sky and a blue light quickly fainted in a diagonal trajectory, dragging behind a faint tail.
zh: 就在她说“哇，好漂亮的星星”时，一颗流星划过天际，一道蓝光沿对角线飞速逝去，拖着一条淡淡的尾巴。

en: "Why are you crying? Did I say something I shouldn't have?" "No, it's just that a drop of sweat got into my eye."
zh: “怎么哭了？我说错什么了吗？”“没，就是汗水流进眼里了。”

en: "Where will we go for lunch?" "Tom, you decide. I can't. "
zh: “中午去哪儿吃？”“汤姆，你定吧，我选不出来。”

en: Still sleepy, right?
zh: 还没睡醒呢吧？

en: You still need more sleep, don't you?
zh: 你还需要再多睡会儿，是吧？

en: I'm sure there will be a day when the world comes together as one.
zh: 我相信总有一天世界会大同的。

en: Has it stopped raining?
zh: 雨停了吗？

en: Have you ever gone to see a horse race?
zh: 你去看过赛马吗？

en: It looks like I lack the capacity for loving two at the same time.
zh: 看来我没本事同时爱上两个人。

en: My sleeping patterns have been turned upside down due to the Olympics.
zh: 因为看奥运会，我的作息都搞乱了。

en: Ah, I forgot my mobile phone.
zh: 啊，我忘带手机了。

en: I'm going crazy from the cigarette stench in this room.
zh: 这屋里的烟味儿快把我熏疯了。

en: I want to be reborn as a Canadian if I had the chance.
zh: 要是有机会，我想投胎当个加拿大人。

en: The tension on the day of the match made me greet the morning without even sleeping a wink.
zh: 比赛那天太紧张了，我一夜没合眼直到天亮。

en: I feel ashamed for living on now.
zh: 苟活到现在，我真觉得挺丢人的。

en: "How many mobile phones do you have, Tom?" "How many? You mean, people actually have more than one?" "I have 4." "Why would you?"
zh: “汤姆，你有几部手机？”“几部？你是说，难道有人会有不止一部手机吗？”“我有4部。”“你要那么多手机干嘛？”

en: Tom makes more money than Mary.
zh: 汤姆挣得比玛丽多。

en: Tom makes more money than Mary does.
zh: 汤姆赚的钱比玛丽多。

en: There are five apples in this box.
zh: 这个盒子里有五个苹果。

en: John picked up the articles one by one and examined them.
zh: 约翰把那些东西一件一件拿起来，仔细察看。

en: My mother is now in the kitchen cooking.
zh: 我妈正在厨房做饭呢。

en: Land prices are very high in Japan.
zh: 日本的地价非常贵。

en: Don't forget to answer the letter.
zh: 别忘了回信。

en: I'll visit a museum today.
zh: 我今天要去参观博物馆。

en: I'll go to a museum today.
zh: 我今天去博物馆。

en: It's really expensive, isn't it?
zh: 真的很贵，对吧？

en: I've climbed Mt. Aso.
zh: 我爬过阿苏山。

en: Do you know what the difference is?
zh: 你知道区别在哪儿吗？

en: What kind of books do you like?
zh: 你喜欢什么样的书？

en: So, what do you suggest?
zh: 那你有什么建议？

en: Excuse me, which way is the station?
zh: 请问，火车站往哪边走？

en: Wait. I can't walk that fast.
zh: 等等，我走不了那么快。

en: Excuse me, where is the taxi stand?
zh: 请问，出租车站设在哪里？

en: "Man, this luggage is heavy!" "Just think of it as weight training."
zh: “天哪，这行李真沉！”“就当是在做负重训练吧。”

en: Would you like some more bread?
zh: 要不要再来点儿面包？

en: May I come, too?
zh: 我也可以去吗？

en: Solitude is fine, but you need someone to tell you that solitude is fine.
zh: 孤独也挺好，但你需要有人告诉你孤独没关系。

en: This plan is currently under consideration.
zh: 这个计划目前正在考虑中。

en: Flowing water does not stagnate.
zh: 流水不腐。

en: What does your father work as?
zh: 你爸爸是做什么工作的？

en: What kind of work does your father do?
zh: 你爸爸做的是哪种工作？

en: He reeled in a huge fish yesterday.
zh: 他昨天钓到了一条大鱼。

en: Alessia cannot speak English.
zh: 阿莱西亚不会说英语。

en: This child aspires to become a laywer in the future.
zh: 这孩子将来想当律师。

en: It's a slow day, huh.
zh: 今天挺闲的哈。

en: You have to work harder on your Japanese studies.
zh: 你的日语得再加把劲学。

en: I'm sorry, but my mother is out at the moment.
zh: 抱歉，我妈现在不在家。

en: It's time. I have to get going.
zh: 时间到了，我得走了。

en: He gave me one last chance.
zh: 他给了我最后一次机会。

en: This is my umbrella, not Tom's.
zh: 这是我的伞，不是汤姆的。

en: If you just crouch a little, the signal flag can just be seen flicking in and out of sight.
zh: 只要稍微蹲下一点，就能看到信号旗在若隐若现地闪烁。

en: He who chases two hares catches none.
zh: 同时追两只兔子，一只也抓不到。

en: The cows grant us their milk, and the chickens grant us their eggs.
zh: 奶牛产奶给我们喝，母鸡下蛋给我们吃。

en: It was love at first sight when you met her?
zh: 你对她是一见钟情吗？

en: I put a stone at the edge of the sheet so that it won't get blown away by the wind.
zh: 我在床单边缘压了一块石头，免得被风吹跑了。

en: My uncle and aunt like spending their summer vacation at a seaside resort. They go sea-bathing everyday during their stay.
zh: 我叔叔婶婶喜欢去海边度假村过暑假，在那儿期间他们每天都去海里游泳。

en: "The Wind Rises" is Hayao Miyazaki's last film.
zh: 《起风了》是宫崎骏的最后一部电影。

en: The snowman had melted completely by the next morning.
zh: 到第二天早上，雪人已经完全化了。

en: The town we live in is beside the sea.
zh: 我们住的小镇在海边。

en: There weren't many visitors spending their vacations on the island in April.
zh: 四月份在岛上度假的人并不多。

en: The most serious problem the world faces is not the strength of the wicked, but the powerlessness of the good.
zh: 世界面临的最严重问题不是邪恶势力的强大，而是善良之人的无力。

en: I set the alarm to 7.
zh: 我把闹钟定在了七点。

en: I'm going until the airport.
zh: 我就去到机场。

en: It looks like the train going to the airport is down, what shall we do?
zh: 看来去机场的火车停运了，我们怎么办？

en: It's already 3 a.m., but I'm wide awake and couldn't fall asleep if I tried.
zh: 都凌晨三点了，可我还是特别精神，怎么也睡不着。

en: I'm hungry this late at night?!
zh: 都这么晚了，我居然饿了？！

en: Can you buy an inhaler without prescription ?
zh: 不带处方能买到吸入器吗？

en: Happy International Women's Day!
zh: 国际妇女节快乐！

en: It is difficult to decide where to go.
zh: 很难决定去哪儿。

en: Please check if the meat is being roasted at the right heat.
zh: 请检查一下烤肉的火候对不对。

en: Are you still awake? It's already three where you are, right?
zh: 你还没睡吗？你那边都三点了吧？

en: There's a new iPhone coming out next month so I think that it's not such a bright idea to buy one now.
zh: 下个月有新款 iPhone 上市，我觉得现在买不是什么好主意。

en: The weather's nice and it's my day off; I want to go somewhere.
zh: 天气挺好的，今天我休息，想去哪儿转转。

en: Do you have an empty room in this hotel?
zh: 这家酒店还有空房吗？

en: It's on the first floor.
zh: 在一楼。

en: Doctors can bury their mistakes, but an architect can only advise his clients to plant ivy.
zh: 医生可以掩埋他们的错误，但建筑师只能建议客户种点常春藤。

en: Does anyone have some moisturizing cream?
zh: 谁有保湿霜？

en: Do you regret the fact that you married me?
zh: 你后悔跟我结婚了吗？

en: Do you regret marrying me?
zh: 你后悔和我结婚吗？

en: Tom put the letter opener back in the desk drawer.
zh: 汤姆把拆信刀放回书桌抽屉里了。

en: I have them all.
zh: 我全都有。

en: The helicopter landed on the roof.
zh: 直升机降落在屋顶上了。

en: She needs a haircut.
zh: 她该剪头发了。

en: "Why didn't you turn the lights on?" "I just couldn't be bothered."
zh: “你怎么没开灯？”“懒得弄。”

en: That was the first time I'd seen Tom so angry.
zh: 那是我第一次见汤姆发这么大火。

en: Pardon me, is there an ATM somewhere around here?
zh: 请问，这附近有取款机吗？

en: Pardon me, is there an ATM in this area?
zh: 请问，这片区域有取款机吗？

en: I spent the whole weekend at home on the computer.
zh: 我整个周末都宅在家里玩电脑。

en: Did you draw this yourself?
zh: 这是你自己画的吗？

en: Germans are very environmentally conscious.
zh: 德国人的环保意识特别强。

en: Before coming to Berlin, I had very little interest in German history.
zh: 来柏林之前，我对德国历史几乎没什么兴趣。

en: Please tell me how to delete my Facebook account.
zh: 请告诉我怎么注销我的脸书账号。

en: Tom works long hours.
zh: 汤姆工作时间很长。

en: We happily accept your proposal.
zh: 我们很高兴接受你的提议。

en: Let me know where you're staying, OK?
zh: 告诉我你住哪儿，行吗？

en: Tom threatened to kill me.
zh: 汤姆威胁要杀了我。

en: Have you seen my keys?
zh: 你看见我钥匙了吗？

en: I wonder what the person who cooked with squid ink for the first time was thinking?
zh: 我在想，第一个用墨鱼汁做饭的人当时在想什么？

en: "Let's speak in French" "I can't be stuffed."
zh: “咱们说法语吧。”“没那闲工夫。”

en: Excuse me, may I borrow a pen?
zh: 打扰一下，能借我支笔吗？

en: Excuse me, but could you lend me a pen?
zh: 不好意思，能借我支笔用一下吗？

en: To tell truth, I find discussions about movies more interesting than movies themselves.
zh: 说实话，我觉得讨论电影比看电影本身更有趣。

en: I'd like to go out stark naked in the middle of this typhoon.
zh: 我真想在这大台风天里一丝不挂地跑出去。

en: Why does my nose run when I eat soup in winter?
zh: 为什么我冬天喝汤的时候会流鼻涕？

en: Why are men strong even if they're slender?
zh: 为什么男的就算长得瘦也有劲？

en: When I was in high school, I wished every day that a meteorite would fall.
zh: 我上高中的时候，每天都盼着有颗陨石掉下来。

en: If I had ten eyes, I could read five books at the same time.
zh: 如果我有十只眼睛，我就能同时看五本书了。

en: I told Tom that his tweets sound like those of a college freshman.
zh: 我跟汤姆说他的推文听起来就像个大一新生写的。

en: I haven't been reading difficult books recently, so my head's going dull.
zh: 最近没怎么读深奥的书，脑子都变迟钝了。

en: When I looked at my travel pictures of when I went on a trip alone to Australia, I felt like crying.
zh: 看着以前一个人去澳洲旅游的照片，我就想哭。

en: Would that the thoughts in my head would come out like a receipt from a cash register.
zh: 要是脑子里的想法能像收银机出小票那样吐出来就好了。

en: If only my thoughts were to come out of my mouth like a receipt being printed.
zh: 要是我的想法能像打印小票那样从嘴里吐出来就好了。

en: I tend to forget what I say when I'm drunk, but I'm confident that it reflects my true feelings.
zh: 我喝醉了容易忘事，但我敢肯定那是酒后吐真言。

en: Hanging around really cool people too much isn’t great because it makes all the other ordinary people you’ve hung out with until then look uncool.
zh: 总是跟太酷的人混在一起其实不太好，因为这会让你以前认识的普通人显得很逊。

en: Before I die, in addition to my last will and testament, I want to write a love letter as well. No matter how shameful it may be, I don't have to be ashamed anymore.
zh: 临死前，除了遗嘱，我还想写一封情书。不管有多丢人，反正到时候也不用再害羞了。

en: If you eat with someone you like, everything is delicious, if you eat with someone you don't like, everything is nasty. If you eat alone, you can't taste anything at all.
zh: 跟喜欢的人一起吃饭，吃什么都香；跟讨厌的人一起吃，吃什么都难吃。一个人吃的话，根本没滋没味。

en: I think Tom worries too much.
zh: 我觉得汤姆担心过头了。

en: Worrying isn't going to help.
zh: 瞎操心也没用。

en: I think you worry too much, Tom.
zh: 汤姆，我觉得你想太多了。

en: This video is not available in your region.
zh: 该视频在你所在的地区无法播放。

en: Let me sleep for ten more minutes.
zh: 让我再睡十分钟。

en: Let me sleep for another ten minutes.
zh: 再让我睡十分钟吧。

en: "Is this clock on time?" "It should be. It gets set automatically."
zh: “这钟准吗？”“应该准，它是自动对时的。”

en: Your voice is raspy. Why?
zh: 你嗓子怎么哑了？怎么回事？

en: "How's life in Paris?" "Well, I'm still not used to speaking in French so I kind of feel like an infant."
zh: “在巴黎生活得怎么样？”“嗯，我还是不太习惯说法语，感觉自己跟个婴儿似的。”

en: I'm glad I was able to meet you yesterday.
zh: 很高兴昨天能见到你。

en: His house and mine are adjacent.
zh: 他家就在我家隔壁。

en: Recently I'm ending up feeling like every single thing is a chore.
zh: 最近我感觉干什么都像是在应付差事。

en: I had intended to go out but now I can't be bothered.
zh: 我本来打算出门的，但现在懒得动了。

en: Why are women such bothersome creatures?
zh: 女人怎么就这么麻烦呢？

en: "Tom has gotten me to do some pretty tedious work." "Again?"
zh: “汤姆让我干了些挺枯燥的活儿。”“又来？”

en: I wonder what I will do once I get home.
zh: 我在想回家以后干点啥呢。

en: I wonder what I'll do once I get home.
zh: 我在想我回家以后要做什么。

en: I'm going with Tom and the others to a karaoke bar today. Are you coming?
zh: 我今天要和汤姆他们去唱K，你去吗？

en: "One of this and two of this, please." "Take-away?" "No, having here."
zh: “这个要一个，这个要两个。”“打包吗？”“不，在这儿吃。”

en: This young man has a bright future.
zh: 这小伙子前途无量。

en: Rabbits love carrots.
zh: 兔子喜欢吃胡萝卜。

en: I’ll be in touch again as soon as I have more detailed information.
zh: 一旦有了更详细的消息，我会再联系你的。

en: "Tom, why are you calling me Mary?" "Aren't you're Mary?" "I'm not Mary, I'm Marie!"
zh: “汤姆，你干嘛叫我玛丽？”“你不是玛丽吗？”“我不是玛丽，我是玛丽埃！”

en: Take a picture with your phone.
zh: 用手机拍张照吧。

en: Men cry, too.
zh: 男人也会哭的。

en: You'd make a good teacher.
zh: 你挺适合当老师的。

en: It's obvious Tom and Mary like each other.
zh: 很明显汤姆和玛丽互相有意思。

en: Maybe you should have a little talk with Tom.
zh: 也许你该找汤姆谈谈。

en: Is it true that Tom changed his name?
zh: 汤姆改名了，是真的吗？

en: Which do you like better, white rice or brown rice?
zh: 白米饭和糙米，你更喜欢哪种？

en: Please wait until tomorrow morning.
zh: 请等到明天早上。

en: The broccoli is overcooked today and so I don't like it.
zh: 今天的西兰花煮得太烂了，我不喜欢。

en: Go and find Tom.
zh: 去找汤姆吧。

en: I told you not to tell anyone.
zh: 我跟你说过别告诉任何人的。

en: All I really need to know in life I learned in Tatoeba.
zh: 我这辈子该懂的道理都是在 Tatoeba 学到的。

en: I wonder why the bus hasn't come.
zh: 我在想公交车怎么还没来。

en: Could you explain a bit easier for me to understand?
zh: 能讲得再简单点儿好让我听懂吗？

en: Please explain it in a way that's easier to understand.
zh: 请解释得再通俗易懂一点。

en: Could you explain it more simply?
zh: 能讲得再简单点儿吗？

en: Please explain it more simply.
zh: 请解释得更简单一些。

en: Which do you like better, spring or fall?
zh: 春天和秋天，你更喜欢哪个？

en: Why did you arrive so early?
zh: 你怎么来这么早？

en: What's your favourite food?
zh: 你最爱吃什么？

en: All I did today was play games.
zh: 我今天光打游戏了。

en: The oven's hot so be careful not to burn yourself.
zh: 烤箱很烫，小心别烫着。

en: I'm going to take a short break.
zh: 我休息一下。

en: I learned everything important in life from mangas.
zh: 我从漫画里学到了人生中所有重要的道理。

en: I had my thirtieth birthday last week.
zh: 我上周刚过完三十岁生日。

en: When does the post office open?
zh: 邮局什么时候开门？

en: The parking lot is open to until when?
zh: 停车场开到几点？

en: Oh no, my mobile phone battery's about to run out. I should have charged it while I was sleeping.
zh: 糟了，手机快没电了。睡觉时该充上电的。

en: "Have you known Tom for a long time?" "No, I've only just met him."
zh: “你认识汤姆很久了吗？”“不，刚认识。”

en: What time does the parking lot close?
zh: 停车场几点关门？

en: Nature is full of mysteries.
zh: 大自然充满了奥秘。

en: Studying Japanese is difficult at times.
zh: 学日语有时候挺难的。

en: If you don't hurry, you'll miss the last train.
zh: 你要是不快点儿，就赶不上末班车了。

en: Your French is really good. Where did you study?
zh: 你的法语真好，在哪儿学的？

en: How much did that beer cost?
zh: 那瓶啤酒多少钱？

en: I know that things will get hairy if I don't start studying for my exams soon, but I just don't have any motivation.
zh: 我知道再不开始复习考试就要麻烦大了，但我就是没动力。

en: Tom looked at the photograph.
zh: 汤姆看了看那张照片。

en: Tom looked at the speedometer.
zh: 汤姆看了看速度表。

en: Tom looked at the thermometer.
zh: 汤姆看了看温度计。

en: Tom looked at them both.
zh: 汤姆看了看他们两个。

en: Tom looked in his briefcase.
zh: 汤姆看了看他的公文包。

en: Tom looked in the fridge to see what he could find to drink.
zh: 汤姆看了看冰箱，想找点喝的。

en: Tom looked in the trunk.
zh: 汤姆看了看后备箱。

en: Tom looked into Mary's eyes.
zh: 汤姆注视着玛丽的眼睛。

en: Do you know what they call a French horn in French?
zh: 你知道圆号用法语怎么说吗？

en: Tom looked into the room.
zh: 汤姆往屋里看了一眼。

en: I wish there were a super discount supermarket in the neighbourhood.
zh: 要是这附近有个超便宜的超市就好了。

en: If the talent is there, one can become a musician.
zh: 只要有天赋，谁都能当音乐家。

en: Now you try.
zh: 现在你试试。

en: I wish I'd been born a Canadian.
zh: 我真希望我出生在加拿大。

en: I wish I'd been born Canadian.
zh: 我要是加拿大人就好了。

en: If Tom had not called me then, I might have killed myself.
zh: 要是当时汤姆没给我打电话，我可能已经自杀了。

en: I wish I'd never been born.
zh: 我真希望我从没出生过。

en: Do you like dogs?
zh: 你喜欢狗吗？

en: How do you like it?
zh: 你觉得怎么样？

en: I'm glad Tom liked it.
zh: 我很高兴汤姆喜欢它。

en: If you sleep with so little on, you'll catch a cold.
zh: 穿这么少睡觉会感冒的。

en: Whaat.. It's already 11? I thought it was still 9'o clock.
zh: 啊？都11点啦？我还以为才9点呢。

en: I still haven’t decided whether to go by car or by train.
zh: 我还没决定是开车还是坐火车去。

en: I’m still tossing up whether to go by car or train.
zh: 我还在纠结是开车还是坐火车。

en: Why do you dislike Tom so much?
zh: 你为什么这么讨厌汤姆？

en: How did you get those bruises on your legs?
zh: 你腿上这些淤青是怎么弄的？

en: The luggage was so heavy that I was worried my arms were going to be torn off.
zh: 行李太沉了，我真怕把胳膊给拉断了。

en: Do you have any suggestions?
zh: 你有什么建议吗？

en: Let me rest a bit.
zh: 让我歇会儿。

en: Tom told me I walked like a penguin.
zh: 汤姆说我走起路来像只企鹅。

en: So what happens then?
zh: 那后来呢？

en: That could never happen.
zh: 那绝对不可能发生。

en: Do you know what's happening?
zh: 你知道发生什么事了吗？

en: Something terrible happened here.
zh: 这儿出大事了。

en: It wasn't supposed to happen.
zh: 这本不该发生的。

en: Cookie would be a good name for a cat.
zh: 给猫起名叫“曲奇”挺不错的。

en: How do you do it exactly?

en: Please come by 2:30.
zh: 请在两点半前过来。

en: Please come at 2:30.
zh: 请两点半过来。

en: I'm not going to leave until I find out what happened.
zh: 不弄清楚发生了什么，我是不会走的。

en: Something has happened to Tom.
zh: 汤姆出事了。

en: I've made a reservation at a drinking place near Shinjuku Station. It's all you can drink for 2 hours for 2,500 yen.
zh: 我在新宿站附近订了个喝酒的地方，2500日元两小时畅饮。

en: I've made a reservation at an izakaya near Shinjuku Station. It's all you can drink for 2 hours for 2,500 yen.
zh: 我在新宿站附近订了家居酒屋，2500日元两小时畅饮。

en: I want to become both physically and mentally stronger.
zh: 我想让自己的身心都变得更强大。

en: I'm drinking milk.
zh: 我在喝牛奶。

en: Why do you like Boston so much?
zh: 你为什么这么喜欢波士顿？

en: And why isn't this an interesting topic?
zh: 为什么这不算个有趣的话题呢？

en: The historical novel was a very popular genre.
zh: 历史小说曾经是一个非常受欢迎的流派。

en: Is there a check-out on the first floor only?
zh: 只有一楼能结账吗？

en: I think Tom expects too much from us.
zh: 我觉得汤姆对我们的要求太高了。

en: I think Tom's expectations of us are too high.
zh: 我觉得汤姆对我们的期望太高了。

en: I want to go to Australia once again before my passport expires.
zh: 我想在护照过期前再去一次澳大利亚。

en: I want to go to Australia once more before my passport expires.
zh: 我想在护照过期前再去一趟澳大利亚。

en: I want to go to Australia one more time before my passport expires.
zh: 我想在护照过期前再多去一次澳大利亚。

en: Don't touch my sandwich.
zh: 别碰我的三明治。

en: Give me your sandwich.
zh: 把你的三明治给我。

en: Do you remember when Tom and Mary came here for the first time?
zh: 你还记得汤姆和玛丽第一次来这里的时候吗？

en: I just don't get the way that men think.
zh: 我真搞不懂男人的思维方式。

en: I don't think I'm the kind of person you could say looks cute or has an adorable voice.
zh: 我觉得我不是那种会被人评价为长得可爱或者声音好听的人。

en: You don't have to reply today.
zh: 你不用今天回复。

en: You don't have to answer today.
zh: 你不用今天给答复。

en: I want to master French pronunciation.
zh: 我想掌握法语发音。

en: It's about time to sleep.
zh: 该睡觉了。

en: I feel like I'll never catch up to Tom, even if it takes a whole lifetime.
zh: 我觉得我这辈子都赶不上汤姆了。

en: Tom has been apologizing too much lately. It makes me feel sorry for him.
zh: 汤姆最近道歉道得太频繁了，弄得我都替他感到难受了。

en: I've always had this on my mind, but what is Tom majoring in?
zh: 我一直想问，汤姆到底是学什么专业的？

en: I want to text, but my eyes hurt.
zh: 我想发信息，但我眼睛疼。

en: I wish winter vacation would never end.
zh: 我真希望寒假永远别结束。

en: I can't wait to hear your voice, Tom.
zh: 汤姆，我等不及想听听你的声音了。

en: "Do you enjoy seeing people blush, Tom?" "I'm not denying it."
zh: “汤姆，你很享受看别人脸红吗？”“我不否认。”

en: Let's talk soon.
zh: 咱们回头聊。

en: My cellphone charger broke down.
zh: 我的手机充电器坏了。

en: The earth is not symmetrical about the equator.
zh: 地球相对于赤道并不是对称的。

en: Everyone loved the cheesecake I baked yesterday.
zh: 大家都非常喜欢我昨天做的芝士蛋糕。

en: I wonder why there's school even when it's this cold.
zh: 我纳闷这么冷的天为什么还要上学。

en: Why are you dressing like it's the middle of summer when it's this cold?
zh: 天这么冷，你干嘛穿得跟过夏天似的？

en: What!? I can't see anything good about him. Doesn't he just break all the girls' hearts?
zh: 什么！？我完全没看出他哪点好。他不就是个专门伤女孩子心的人吗？

en: It's not funny! Do you have any idea how worried I was?
zh: 这一点都不好笑！你知道我有多担心吗？

en: What are you doing staring at my girlfriend like that?
zh: 你干嘛那样盯着我女朋友看？

en: Black looks good on you.
zh: 你穿黑色挺好看的。

en: The changing of the seasons have a tendency to affect our health, so take care.
zh: 换季时容易影响健康，多保重身体。

en: At Tom's last job, unable to meet sales quotas, he was forced to buy his own goods.
zh: 汤姆在上一份工作中，因为完不成销售指标，被迫自掏腰包买公司的产品。

en: At the end of the year in Japan, concerts of Beethoven's Ninth are held in various regions as if it's an annual event.
zh: 在日本，年底各地都会举行贝多芬第九交响曲的音乐会，就像是一项年度传统。

en: You have "lies" written all over your face.
zh: 你脸上写满了谎言。

en: "It was worth the two-hour wait." "Yeah! I'll cherish this signature for a lifetime."
zh: “等了两个小时也值了。”“是啊！这个签名我会珍藏一辈子的。”

en: "It was worth the two-hour wait, huh." "Yeah! I'll cherish this autograph for the rest of my life."
zh: “等了两个小时挺值的吧。”“嗯！这个签名我这辈子都会好好珍藏。”

en: Tomorrow is a long-awaited payday!
zh: 明天就是期待已久的发薪日了！

en: Today is April Fools, so I'm telling nothing but lies.
zh: 今天是愚人节，所以我说的全都是假话。

en: Is this a trick question?

en: I'm going to go tomorrow no matter what.
zh: 明天不管怎样我都要去。

en: Is yogurt okay to eat if it's one month past the 'best before' date?

en: I should've read the original work before watching the movie.

en: Can you distinguish between Americans and Canadians?

en: Have you already been to Nara?

en: If only there was more time.
zh: 要是时间再多一点就好了。

en: Their car is not good.
zh: 他们的车不怎么样。

en: Have you ever spoken to Tom?
zh: 你跟汤姆说过话吗？

en: Tom, quiet down a little!
zh: 汤姆，安静点！

en: Excuse me, what station is this?
zh: 请问，这是哪一站？

en: It looks like the temperature is going to drop tonight, so be careful not to catch a cold.
zh: 看来今晚要降温，小心别感冒了。

en: Today sure is hot! I wore the wrong kind of clothing.
zh: 今天真热！我穿错衣服了。

en: I should've worn a short-sleeved shirt.
zh: 我该穿短袖衬衫的。

en: I should've worn a short-sleeve shirt.
zh: 我该穿短袖衬衫的。

en: I should've worn short sleeves.
zh: 我该穿短袖的。

en: I wish I'd worn short sleeves.
zh: 我要是穿了短袖就好了。

en: No one's home at my place today, so do you want to come over?
zh: 今天我家没人，你想过来吗？

en: What would you do if I were untrue to you?
zh: 如果我对你不忠，你会怎么办？

en: What would you do if I were untrue?
zh: 如果我不忠，你会怎么办？

en: Let's be careful about men.
zh: 咱们对男人小心点吧。

en: I haven't spoken to Tom since I left Boston.
zh: 自从离开波士顿，我就没再跟汤姆说过话。

en: Boston is a great town.
zh: 波士顿是个很棒的地方。

en: Religion is a daughter of Hope and Fear, explaining to Ignorance the nature of the Unknowable.
zh: 宗教是希望和恐惧的女儿，它向无知解释着不可知事物的本质。

en: Where did you buy your golf clubs?
zh: 你的高尔夫球杆是在哪儿买的？

en: When did you buy this car?
zh: 你什么时候买的这辆车？

en: Mary looked through the text messages on Tom's mobile phone and it became clear to her that he was having an affair.
zh: 玛丽看了汤姆手机里的短信，意识到他在搞外遇。

en: Let's give up.
zh: 咱们放弃吧。

en: Give me my money back.
zh: 把我的钱还给我。

en: Give me a day or two.
zh: 给我一两天时间。

en: Give me a break here.
zh: 饶了我吧。

en: Can you give me an explanation?
zh: 你能给我个解释吗？

en: Is it a bird?
zh: 那是只鸟吗？

en: Is it a chair?
zh: 那是把椅子吗？

en: It is a bird.
zh: 那是只鸟。

en: We gave them everything we had.
zh: 我们把我们有的一切都给他们了。

en: Have you given Tom the key?
zh: 你把钥匙给汤姆了吗？

en: Can you give me a little bit more time?
zh: 能再多给我点时间吗？

en: It seems that my little sister got her wallet stolen at school.
zh: 我妹妹的钱包好像在学校被偷了。

en: I heard that the new English teacher is a handsome guy who looks like Tom Cruise.
zh: 听说新来的英语老师是个帅哥，长得像汤姆·克鲁斯。

en: You're not a man.
zh: 你不是个男人。

en: You're not a woman.
zh: 你不是个女人。

en: You're an engineer.
zh: 你是个工程师。

en: Have you ever eaten Turkish food before?
zh: 你以前吃过土耳其菜吗？

en: My wife went to the farm.
zh: 我老婆去农场了。

en: His money is in the bank.
zh: 他的钱在银行里。

en: Pua is singing.
zh: 普阿在唱歌。

en: Have you ever eaten Turkish food?
zh: 你吃过土耳其菜吗？

en: Mom, when's supper?
zh: 妈，什么时候吃晚饭？

en: Tom, put these gloves on.
zh: 汤姆，戴上这些手套。

en: Tom put the luggage down.
zh: 汤姆把行李放下了。

en: Tom put down his racket.
zh: 汤姆放下了他的球拍。

en: I don't know how to make friends anymore.
zh: 我都不知道该怎么交朋友了。

en: I've forgotten how to make friends.
zh: 我都忘了该怎么交朋友了。

en: I want to become better at managing my time.
zh: 我想更好地管理我的时间。

en: The more I try to forget about my ex, the more I think about him.
zh: 我越想忘记前任，就越会想到他。

en: The more I try to forget about my ex-boyfriend, the more I think about him.
zh: 我越想忘记前男友，就越会想到他。

en: When it comes to musical instruments, the more you practice, the more skilled you become.
zh: 说到乐器，练得越多就越熟练。

en: Tom put on his coat and went out.
zh: 汤姆穿上外套出去了。
